verses.1: Hih thu za un, mi khempeuh aw! Ngai un, leitung a a teeng khempeuh,
verses.2: mi lian mi neu, mihau mizawngte aw!
verses.3: Ka kam in pilna thu gen dinga, ka lungsim ngaihsutna kitel siang ding hi.
verses.4: Paunak thu theih hak khat ka ngaihsun dinga, laiza lasakna tawh a khiatna ka gen tel ding hi.
verses.5: Haksat hun, hong bawlsiateʼ gitlohna in hong nencip ciangin bang hangin lau ding ka hi hiam?
verses.6: Mite in a hauhna uh muangin, tampi a neihna uh a kisaktheih pih hangun,
verses.7: amah le amah a kitan khia tawm zo taktak, a nuntakna man ding Pasianʼ tungah a pia zo mi kuamah om lo hi.
verses.8: Bang hang hiam cih leh a nuntakna tat nading a man tam mahmah a, Leihawmpi mu ngei lo zah ding a hing tawntung dingin kitan khia zo ngei lo hi.
verses.10: Amah in a pilte nangawn a si mu dinga, a haite le a tei lote a kibangin sia-in, amauʼ neihsa khempeuh midangteʼ tungah nusiat uh hi.
verses.11: Amaute in leitangte amauʼ min a puaksak uh hangin hankhuk pen khang tawntung amauʼ omna hi ngitnget ding hi.
verses.12: Ama hauhna ah mi kipsuak thei lo a, a si thei ganhingte tawh a kibang lel ahi hi.
verses.13: Hih pen a kihai muanteʼ ngah hi a, amauʼ ngah sa tawh a lungkimteʼ thumong ahi hi.
verses.14: Tua bangin amaute Leinuai-a dingin kiseh hi. Sihna pen amau a cing pa hi ding hi. Han khuk sungah amaute tuak suk suak ding uh a, a mel uh sia dinga, Leinuai, amauʼ inn hi ding hi.
verses.15: Ahih hangin Pasian in Leinuaiʼ vangliatna panin kei hong hon khia ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in kei hong sang ding hi.
verses.16: Mi khatpeuh a hauh ciang ahi a, a innkuan minthanna a khan ciang ahi zongin lau-in lunghihmawh dingin ngaihsun tuan kei in.
verses.17: Bang hang hiam cih leh a sih ciangin bangmah keng lo dinga, a minthanna in amah zui suk lo ding hi.
verses.18: A hin lai-in amah a lungdamin kingaihsunin, mi khat in ama ading na a lim sep ciangin phatna a ngah hangin,
verses.19: khuavak a mu nawn lo dingin a si khin sa a pu a pate kiang mahah amah pai veve ding hi.
verses.20: Ama hauhna in mi hing paisuaksak thei lo a, a si thei ganhingte tawh a kibang lel ahi hi.
